verses.roman:
vyagra hañā āne rājā matta-hātī-gaṇa
ratha cālāite rathe karila yojana

synonyms: vyagra hañā—with eagerness; āne—brings; rājā—the King; matta-hātī-gaṇa—very strong elephants; ratha cālāite—to make the car move; rathe—to the car; karila yojana—harnessed.
translation: Becoming even more eager to move the car, the King had very strong elephants brought forth and harnessed to it.
